changeSet.sql: create sequence fundraising_proposal_seq; create table if not exists fundraising_proposal ( id bigint not null constraint fundraising_proposal_pkey primary key, first_name varchar(255), last_name varchar(255), company_name varchar(255), website varchar(255), email varchar(255), phone_number varchar(255), previously_raised numeric(19,2), funding_goals bigint, content varchar(10000), request_state_id bigint constraint fundraising_proposal_fk_on_request_state references request_state );
